patthana18.15:4.1: Āsavaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.15:5.1: Noāsavaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanoāsavo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana18.15:6.1: Āsavaṃ hetuñca noāsavaṃ hetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana18.15:7.1: Noāsavaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanoāsavo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
